name: Reaching: Chapter 1
description:
Even if that hand reaches out to him, Ouma Kokichi won't pull it, or let himself be pulled. A helping hand is useless if the person being helped spurns it.

The loop continues again.

This game is the first installment in the visual novel adaptation of ao3 fanfiction Reaching, with extra content and all original sprites!

An alternative read of Danganronpa v3, Reaching sets out to explore the idea of time-travel within the series. Death is the end of the line... usually. However, when Ouma Kokichi died, he just came right back. Right back into that same locker he was stuffed into the first time.

This kinectic novel follows him as he tries to prevent the same outcome from repeating. Just how much can you take, when you roll the die again and again?

This game was made for two very special reasons: as a celebration of saiou day 2022, and as an anniversary gift to the author, my wonderful s/o. And if you decide to go ahead and play it, I  hope you enjoy it. It was made with nothing but love in mind.

Features:

  • 10K+ word script
  • New bits of dialogue
  • New, original sprites
  • Some really cool songs idek
  • Someone slowly losing his sanity as he fails again and again
  • Ouma Kokichi from the Danganronpa May Cry series

Feel free to check out the original fanfiction here!

We don't claim any ownership of any Danganronpa character, they belong to Spike Chunsoft.
